column4: hi all.  Question: is there a way to install ubuntu without the liveCD boot? i guess my RAM is not enough(256Mb) to do a live boot and then to install
hi all.  Question: is there a way to install ubuntu without the liveCD boot? i guess my RAM is not enough(256Mb) to do a live boot and then to install
i don't know what happens, but the live boot keeps hanging
256 is not sufficient to run Ubuntu, you probably want Xubuntu
